com.durbha.jc.pwhasher.util

Class PoolThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.durbha.jc.pwhasher.util.PoolThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PoolThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    A simple thread implementation. This will be what goes into a thread poo.

    Its job is to poll on the taskQueue until a new request is available. See ThreadPool for details on how the taskQueue is populated.

    It also waits a maximum of POLL_WAIT_MAX_SECONDS second on the polling. When it comes out of the polling after POLL_WAIT_MAX_SECONDS seconds, it will check for the isStopped flag If it is set, then it will terminate itself. If not, then it will go into polling again.
